name: LETTER_PRINT_HISTORY
description: Table for per claim EOB print data.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the claim info record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: LETTER_HX_NOTIF_PRINT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The print type of the letter

columns.name: LETTER_HX_DTTM
columns.description: The print instant of the letter

columns.name: LETTER_HX_USER_ID
columns.description: The user who printed the letter

columns.name: LETTER_HX_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: LETTER_HX_PRINT_JOB_CLASS_C_NAME
columns.description: The letter type of the letter

columns.name: LETTER_HX_SMARTTEXT_ID
columns.description: The SmartText template used to generate the letter

columns.name: LETTER_HX_SMARTTEXT_ID_SMARTTEXT_NAME
columns.description: The name of the SmartText record.
